div.iframe: This iframe contains the logic required to handle AJAX powered Gravity Forms.
div.script: document.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() { jQuery(document).ready(function($){gformInitSpinner( 782791940, 'https://www.kipp.org/wp-content/plugins/gravityforms/images/spinner.gif' );jQuery('#gform_ajax_frame_782791940').load( function(){var contents = jQuery(this).contents().find('*').html();var is_postback = contents.indexOf('GF_AJAX_POSTBACK') >= 0;if(!is_postback){return;}var form_content = jQuery(this).contents().find('#gform_wrapper_782791940');var is_confirmation = jQuery(this).contents().find('#gform_confirmation_wrapper_782791940').length > 0;var is_redirect = contents.indexOf('gformRedirect(){') >= 0;var is_form = form_content.length > 0 && ! is_redirect && ! is_confirmation;if(is_form){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_782791940').html(form_content.html());if(form_content.hasClass('gform_validation_error')){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_782791940').addClass('gform_validation_error');} else {jQuery('#gform_wrapper_782791940').removeClass('gform_validation_error');}setTimeout( function() { /* delay the scroll by 50 milliseconds to fix a bug in chrome */ }, 50 );if(window['gformInitDatepicker']) {gformInitDatepicker();}if(window['gformInitPriceFields']) {gformInitPriceFields();}var current_page = jQuery('#gform_source_page_number_1').val();gformInitSpinner( 782791940, 'https://www.kipp.org/wp-content/plugins/gravityforms/images/spinner.gif' );jQuery(document).trigger('gform_page_loaded', [782791940, current_page]);window['gf_submitting_782791940'] = false;}else if(!is_redirect){var confirmation_content = jQuery(this).contents().find('#gforms_confirmation_message_782791940').html();if(!confirmation_content){confirmation_content = contents;}setTimeout(function(){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_782791940').replaceWith('<' + 'div id=\'gforms_confirmation_message_782791940\' class=\'gform_confirmation_message_782791940 gforms_confirmation_message\'' + '>' + confirmation_content + '<' + '/div' + '>');jQuery(document).trigger('gform_confirmation_loaded', [782791940]);window['gf_submitting_782791940'] = false;}, 50);}else{jQuery('#gform_782791940').append(contents);if(window['gformRedirect']) {gformRedirect();}}jQuery(document).trigger('gform_post_render', [782791940, current_page]);} );} ); }, false );

© KIPP Foundation.
All rights reserved.
Work hard. Be nice.
KIPP is committed to equal treatment for all individuals. KIPP does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, gender, disability, age, religion, sexual orientation, or national or ethnic origin.
